sub_title: Senior Consultant @ Morgens | PhD | Program & project management | VBHC | Strategy & organizational development | Change management
summary:
Welcome to my LinkedIn profile ツ

This is me:
✮ Senior consultant @ Morgens
✮ Co-chair of a national working group on value based quality improvement
✮ Passion for healthcare and in particular curative care
✮ Enthusiastic, driven and always challenged to achieve the best result
✮ Love to use creative, interactive working methods for better results
✮ Assignments in strategy, organizational development. VBHC

My expertise:
✮ Projectmanagement (Prince2 Foundation)
✮ Program management (MSP Foundation)
✮ Continuous improvement (Lean Greenbelt) 
✮ Change management (Change Management Foundation) 
✮ Psychology (PhD Psychology)

www.morgens.nl 
boosman@morgens.nl

profile_positions.description: Met de werkgroep zetten we ons in om leren en verbeteren beter van de grond te krijgen, zodat we écht waarde kunnen creëren. In de praktijk blijkt het vaak lastig om voldoende tijd te vinden voor verbeteren. Met de toenemende krapte op de arbeidsmarkt en de oplopende zorgvraag wordt dit een steeds grotere uitdaging. Meer capaciteit of middelen is niet de oplossing. We moeten slimmer werken!
profile_positions.title: Co-chair working group Value-Based Quality Improvement

profile_positions.description: The Linnean Initiatieve is a unique, nationwide collaborating, open, learning network that was launched by patients, healthcare professionals, administrators, policy makers and payers in the Netherlands. Currently, over 1100 members of the network have the common goal to improve quality of care and quality of life by accelerating the pace of value-based health care implementation/the transition to a value-based healthcare system in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Co-chair working group PREM / patient experience / value based quality improvement

profile_positions.description: Morgens is a consultancy for the public sector. We guide our clients to become future-ready, allowing them to respond flexibly to all the changes that affect them. The focus is on the business side: processes, cooperation, performance and structure. We do this with sparkling methods and actively involve leaders and employees.
profile_positions.title: Senior consultant

profile_positions.description: Doorontwikkeling van het Zorg Coördinatie Centrum Zuid-Holland Noord en het Regionaal Aanmeldpunt
profile_positions.title: Projectleider zorgcoordinatie bij Transmuralis
Procesbegeleider ‘Eigen regie, doe je samen’ bij het Bravis ziekenhuis

profile_positions.description: The Fit for the Future program is aimed at realizing a future-proof model for organization and management. In a matrix organization, medical departments work together in 11 centers.
profile_positions.title: Procesbegeleider Fit for the Future Radboudumc
Procesbegeleider strategie Integraal Capaciteitsmanagement (ICM) UMC Utrecht

profile_positions.description: CAIRElab is a knowledge and expertise center in the field of artificial intelligence (AI). The aim of this center is to investigate the development and research of AI in healthcare. My focus was change management aspects. More info: https:// campagne.lumc.nl/ai-in-de-zorg.
profile_positions.title: Core team member Clinical Artificial Intelligence and Research Lab (CAIRElab)

profile_positions.description: JongLUMC is a young professional netwerk.
profile_positions.title: Board member JongLUMC

profile_positions.description: Value Based Healthcare (VBHC) will become the foundation of patient care at the LUMC: patients must benefit from our care, according to their own standards, at acceptable costs. Science plays an essential role in assessing the (added) value of changes and innovations. VBHC offers the opportunity to make a stronger connection between research and care to demonstrably improve care. As program manager of the science and evaluation programme, I have worked to create a scientific foundation for VBHC. I was also part of the implementation team.
profile_positions.title: Program manager Value Based Healthcare (VBHC)

profile_positions.description: European Reference Networks and national expertise center for rare diseases
profile_positions.title: Program manager Rare Disease Office

profile_positions.description: PhD thesis ‘Learning after acquired brain injury. Learning the hard way’.
profile_positions.title: PhD researcher

profile_positions.description: As a junior researcher I gained experience with project management in a research setting. I have worked on several projects, which has resulted in scientific publications.
profile_positions.title: Junior researcher

profile_positions.description: SVRZ location Ter Valcke is a nursing home for care and rehabilitation. As a psychologist I worked in a multidisciplinary team. The focus of my work was on neuropsychological research and counseling of patients with acquired brain injury or a neurodegenerative disease.
profile_positions.title: Psychologist

profile_positions.description: As a research assistant I was involved in various projects.
profile_positions.title: Research assistant

volunteer_experiences.description: Afasie is een taalstoornis die het gevolg is van hersenletsel. Als vrijwilliger was ik actief bij wekelijkse sessies gericht op het oefenen van gespreksvaardigheden.

De Derde Kamer is een schaduwparlement voor ontwikkelingssamenwerking. Alle leden werkten aan één of meer voorstellen om het Nederlandse beleid voor internationale ontwikkelingssamenwerking te verbeteren.
Begeleider bij één-op-één vakantiebegeleiding van meervoudig complex gehandicapten.  Begeleiding en verzorging van gehandicapten (ADL).
Hét netwerk voor jonge professionals in het LUMC.
